short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fill form fields using a JSON object

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Form AutoFiller is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline the process of filling out online forms. By simply pasting a JSON object, users can automatically populate form fields with the corresponding values, saving time and minimizing errors during testing.

Key Features:

Quick Form Filling: Instantly fill out forms by pasting a JSON object.
Customizable Settings: Choose whether to auto-fill forms upon pasting or fill manually by clicking a button.
Support for Complex Data Structures: Handle arrays and nested objects to populate various types of form fields.
Error Notifications: Get notified when fields are not found, with helpful tooltips to guide debugging.
History Management: Save previously used JSONs for quick access and filling in future forms.
Clear Form Functionality: Easily reset forms using the same JSON structure.
How to Use:

Copy your JSON data.
Open the extension and paste the JSON into the text area.
Select the auto-fill option if desired, or click the "Fill Form" button to populate the fields.
Use the "Clear Fields" button to reset the form when needed.
